title: issue with the Method too large problem
body:
### Describe the bug

build is failing with below error
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.4.0.Final:build (default) on project code-with-quarkus-demo: Failed to build q
uarkus application: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
[ERROR] [error]: Build step io.quarkus.deployment.steps.ConfigGenerationBuildStep#generateConfigClass threw an exception: org.objectweb.asm.Meth
odTooLargeException: Method too large: io/quarkus/runtime/generated/Config.<clinit> ()V

when running in mvn clean install getting above error 

### Expected behavior

build should got passed 

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

[code-with-quarkus-demo.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/7676233/code-with-quarkus-demo.zip)

run the clean install it will fail

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

_No response_
